mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasks ( title, status, due_month, due_date, created_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{status}, #{due_month}, #{due_date}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tasks SET status = 2 WHERE status = 1 AND STR_TO_DATE(due_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
UPDATE tasks SET status = 1 WHERE status = 0 AND STR_TO_DATE(due_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()
